# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-105">合规性中心中的数据丢失防护 (DLP) 包括许多可供您在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-110">ABA 传送号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-111">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-112">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-112">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-113">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-114">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-115">以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-115">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-116">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-117">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-117">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-118">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-118">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-119">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-119">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-120">未格式化：以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-120">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-121">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-122">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-123">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-124">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-125">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-126">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-146">阿根廷国家标识 (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-148">八个数字，用点分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-150">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-151">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-151">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-152">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-152">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-154">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-154">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-155">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-155">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-157">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-159">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-160">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-161">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-173">澳大利亚银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-175">具有或不具有银行状态分支号码的6到 twn 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-175">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-177">帐号是6到10位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-177">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-178">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-179">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-180">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-180">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-181">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-181">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-182">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-183">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-184">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-185">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-186">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-187">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-188">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-189">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-190">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-191">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-207">澳大利亚商业电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-207">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-208">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-209">11个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-209">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-210">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-211">11个带可选分隔符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-211">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-212">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-212">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-213">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-213">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-214">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-214">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-215">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-215">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-216">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-216">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-217">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-217">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-218">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-218">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-220">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-222">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-223">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-223">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-224">找到 Keywords_australian_business_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-224">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-226">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-226">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-236">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-236">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-238">9个带分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-238">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-240">九位数带分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-240">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-241">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-241">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-242">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-242">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-243">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-244">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-244">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-245">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-245">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-247">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-250">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-250">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-251">找到 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-251">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-252">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-252">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-253">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-253">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-258">澳大利亚公司编号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-258">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-259">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-259">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-260">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-260">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-261">澳大利亚公司编号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-261">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-262">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-262">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-263">澳大利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-263">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-264">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-265">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-265">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-266">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-267">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-267">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-268">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-268">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-269">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-269">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-270">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-270">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-271">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-272">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-272">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-273">4到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-273">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-274">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-274">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-275">9个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-275">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-276">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-277">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-277">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-278">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-279">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-280">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-280">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-281">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-281">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-282">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-282">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-382">澳大利亚医疗帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-382">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-383">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-384">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-384">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-385">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-386">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-386">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-387">第一个数字在范围2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-387">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-388">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-388">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-389">第十位数字是问题位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-389">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-390">第十位数字 (可选) 是单个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-390">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-391">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-392">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-392">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-393">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-394">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-395">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-395">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-396">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-396">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-397">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-397">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-409">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-409">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-411">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-411">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-412">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-413">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-413">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-414">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-415">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-416">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-417">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-417">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-418">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-418">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-419">找到 Keyword_passport 或 Keyword_australia_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-419">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-453">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-453">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-454">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-455">8到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-455">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-456">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-457">通常显示空格的八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-457">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-458">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-458">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-459">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-459">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-460">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-461">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-461">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-462">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-462">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-464">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-467">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-467">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-468">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-468">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-469">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-469">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-470">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-470">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-471">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-471">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-472">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-472">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-473">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-473">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-474">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-474">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-475">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-475">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-476">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-476">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-477">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-477">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-478">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-478">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-479">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-479">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-480">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-480">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-481">奥地利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-481">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-482">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-482">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-484">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-484">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-486">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-486">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-487">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-488">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-489">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-490">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-491">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-491">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-492">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-492">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-495">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-495">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-498">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-498">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-499">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-499">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-500">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-500">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-501">driver's licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-501">driver's licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-502">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-502">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-503">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-503">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-504">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-504">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-505">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-505">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-506">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-506">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-507">fuhrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-507">fuhrerschein</span></span>

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-509">奥地利身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-509">Austria identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-510">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-511">字母、数字和特殊字符的24个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-511">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-512">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-512">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-513">24个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-513">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-514">22个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-514">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-515">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-515">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-516">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-517">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-517">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-518">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-519">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-519">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-520">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-520">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-521">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-521">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-522">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-522">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-523">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-523">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-524">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-524">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-525">
national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-525">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-526">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-526">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-527">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-527">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-528">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号码 sensitiveinformation 类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-528">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-529">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-530">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-530">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-531">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-532">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-532">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-533">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-533">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-534">一个空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-534">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-535">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-535">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-536">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-537">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-537">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-538">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-539">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-540">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-540">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-541">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-541">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-542">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-543">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-543">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-544">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-544">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-545">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-545">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-546">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-546">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-547">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-547">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-548">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-548">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-549">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-549">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-550">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-550">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-551">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-552">以指定格式表示的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-552">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-554">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-554">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-555">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-555">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-556">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-556">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-557">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-557">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-558">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-559">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-559">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-560">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-561">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-561">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-562">函数 "Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-562">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-563">_or_equivalent "找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-563">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-564">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-564">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-565">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-565">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-566">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-566">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-582">奥地利税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-582">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-583">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-584">9个数字，带可选连字符和正斜线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-584">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-585">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-585">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-586">9个带可选连字符和正斜线的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-586">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-587">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-587">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-588">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-588">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-589">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-589">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-590">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-590">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-591">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-591">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-592">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-593">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-594">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-595">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-596">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-596">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-597">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-597">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-598">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-598">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-599">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-599">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-622">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-622">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-623">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-624">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-624">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-625">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-626">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-626">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-627">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-627">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-628">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-628">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-629">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-629">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-630">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-630">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-631">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-631">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-632">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-632">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-633">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-633">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-634">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-634">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-635">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-635">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-636">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-636">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-637">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-638">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-638">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-639">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-640">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-640">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-641">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-641">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-642">找到 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-642">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-643">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-644">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-644">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-653">奥地利 vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-653">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-654">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-654">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-655">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-655">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-656">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-656">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-657">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-657">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-658">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-658">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-659">vat 标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-659">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-660">atu 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-660">atu number</span></span>

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-662">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-662">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-664">字符串 "DocumentDb"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-664">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-665">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-665">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-666">字符串 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-666">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-667">介于3-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-667">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-668">大于符号 ( # A0) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-668">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-669">86小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-669">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-670">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-670">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-672">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-674">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-675">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-675">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-676">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-676">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-691">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-691">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-693">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-693">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-694">com "或" cloudapp "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-694">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-695">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-695">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-696">net "和字符串" Password "或" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-696">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-697">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-698">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-698">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-699">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-699">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-700">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-700">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-701">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-701">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-702">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-702">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-703">字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-703">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-704">com "，" cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-704">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-705">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-705">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-706">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-706">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-707">介于1-300 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-707">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-708">字符串 "Password"、"password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-708">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-709">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-709">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-710">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-710">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-711">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-711">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-712">一个或多个不是分号的字符 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-712">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-713">分号 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-713">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-714">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-715">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-715">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-716">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-717">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-717">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-718">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-718">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-719">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-719">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-734">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-734">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-736">字符串 "HostName"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "azure 设备"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-736">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-737">net "和" SharedAccessKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-737">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-739">字符串 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-739">the string "HostName"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-742">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-742">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-743">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-743">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-744">字符串 "azure 设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-744">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-745">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-745">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-746">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-746">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-747">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-747">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-748">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-748">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-749">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-749">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-750">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-750">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-751">43小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-751">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-752">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-752">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-753">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-754">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-754">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-755">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-756">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-756">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-757">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-757">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-758">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-758">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-773">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-773">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-774">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-775">字符串 "userpwd ="，后跟一个字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-775">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-776">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-776">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-777">字符串 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-777">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-778">任何60小写字母或数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-778">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-779">引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-779">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-780">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-781">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-781">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-782">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-783">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-784">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-784">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-785">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-785">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-800">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-800">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-801">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-802">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-802">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-803">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-803">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-804">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-804">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-805">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-805">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-806">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-806">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-807">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-807">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-808">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-808">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-809">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-809">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-810">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-810">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-811">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-811">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-812">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-812">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-813">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-813">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-814">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-815">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-815">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-816">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-817">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-818">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-818">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-819">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-819">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-834">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-834">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-835">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-836">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-836">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-837">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-837">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-838">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-838">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-839">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-839">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-841">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-841">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
