- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1739">墨守成规</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1739">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1740">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1740">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1741">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1741">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1742">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1742">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1743">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1743">Identificación</span></span> 

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1744">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1744">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1745">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1746">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1746">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1747">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1747">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1748">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1748">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1749">6个数字，这是一个地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1749">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1750">8位数，形式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1750">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1751">三个数字，这是一个订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1751">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1752">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1752">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1753">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1754">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1754">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1755">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1756">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1756">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1757">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1757">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1758">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1758">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1759">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1760">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1760">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1761">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1761">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1762">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1762">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1768">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1768">身份证</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1770">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1770">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1771">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1771">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1772">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1772">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1773">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1773">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1774">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1774">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1775">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1775">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1777">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1777">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1779">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1779">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1780">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1781">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1781">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1782">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1783">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1784">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1784">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1785">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1785">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1786">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1786">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1787">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1787">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1788">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1789">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1790">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1790">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1791">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1791">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-1792">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-1792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2052">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2052">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2053">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2053">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2054">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2055">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2055">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2057">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2057">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2058">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2059">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2059">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2060">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2061">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2062">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2062">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2063">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2063">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2069">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2069">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2070">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2070">drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2079">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2079">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2080">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2080">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2081">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2082">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2082">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2083">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2084">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2084">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2085">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2086">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2086">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2087">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2088">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2088">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2089">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2089">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2090">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2090">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2121">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2121">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2122">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2122">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2123">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2124">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2124">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2125">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2126">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2126">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2127">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2128">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2128">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2129">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2130">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2131">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2131">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2132">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2132">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2133">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2133">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2134">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2134">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2135">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2136">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2136">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2137">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2137">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2138">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2138">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2139">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2139">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2141">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2141">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2142">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2143">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2143">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2144">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2144">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2145">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2145">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2146">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2147">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2147">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2148">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2149">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2150">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2150">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2151">找到 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2151">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2152">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2152">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2153">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2153">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2154">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2154">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2155">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2155">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2186">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2186">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2187">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2189">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2189">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2190">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2191">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2191">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2192">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2192">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2193">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2193">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2194">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2195">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2195">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2196">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2197">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2198">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2198">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2199">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2199">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2200">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2200">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2201">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2201">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2218">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2218">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2219">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2219">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2220">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2221">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2221">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2222">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2222">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2223">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2223">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2224">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2225">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2225">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2226">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2227">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2228">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2228">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2229">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2229">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2244">塞浦路斯标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2244">Cyprus identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2246">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2246">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2247">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2248">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2248">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2249">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2250">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2250">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2251">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2252">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2252">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2253">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2253">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2254">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2254">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2263">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2263">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2264">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2266">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2266">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2267">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2268">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2268">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2269">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2270">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2270">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2271">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2272">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2272">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2273">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2273">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2274">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2274">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2275">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2275">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2276">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2276">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2277">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2277">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2278">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2278">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2279">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2279">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2280">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2280">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2281">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2281">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2282">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2282">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2283">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2283">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2284">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2284">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2285">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2285">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2286">"0" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2286">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2287">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2287">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2288">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2288">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2289">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2290">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2290">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2291">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2292">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2292">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2293">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2293">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2294">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2294">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2295">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2296">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2296">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2324">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2324">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2325">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2325">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2326">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2327">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2327">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2328">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2329">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2329">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2330">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2330">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2331">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2331">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2332">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2332">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2333">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2334">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2334">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2335">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2336">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2336">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2337">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2337">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2338">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2338">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2352">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2352">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2355">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2355">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2356">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2356">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2357">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2358">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2358">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2359">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2360">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2360">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2361">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2362">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2362">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2363">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2364">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2365">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2365">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2366">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2366">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2374">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2374">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2375">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2376">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2376">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2377">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2378"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2378">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2379">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2379">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2380">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2380">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2381">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2381">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2382">10个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2382">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2383">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2383">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2384">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2384">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2385">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2385">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2386">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2387">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2387">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2388">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2389">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2390">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2390">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2391">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2391">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2392">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2392">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2393">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2394">函数 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2394">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2395">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2442">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2442">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2443">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2445">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2445">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2446">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2447">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2447">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2448">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2448">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2449">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2449">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2450">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2450">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2451">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2451">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2452">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2453">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2453">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2454">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2455">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2455">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2456">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2456">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2457">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2457">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2458">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2459">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2459">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2462">出生号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2462">birth number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2466">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2466">nationalnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2475">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2475">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2476">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2476">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2478">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2478">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2479">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2480">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2480">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2481">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2482">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2482">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2483">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2484">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2485">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2485">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2486">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2486">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2503">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2503">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2504">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2504">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2505">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2506">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2506">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2507">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2508">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2508">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2509">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2510">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2510">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2511">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2512">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2513">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2513">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2514">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2514">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2516">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2516">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2522">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2522">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2523">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2523">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2524">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2525">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2525">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2526">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2527">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2527">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2528">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2528">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2529">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2529">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2530">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2530">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2531">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2532">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2533">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2534">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2535">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2535">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2536">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2536">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2537">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2538">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2538">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2539">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2539">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2540">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2612">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2612">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2613">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2613">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2614">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2615">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2615">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2616">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2617">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2617">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2618">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2618">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2619">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2619">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2620">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2620">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2621">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2622">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2622">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2623">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2624">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2624">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2625">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2625">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2626">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2626">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2627">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2628">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2628">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2629">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2630">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2630">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2631">个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2631">personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2633">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2633">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2634">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2634">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2635">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2635">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2636">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2636">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2637">国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2637">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2638">个人 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2638">personal id number</span></span>

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2642">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2642">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2643">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2644">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2644">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2645">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2646">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2646">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2647">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 这组可能的字母： abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2647">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2648">一个字母 (不区分大小写) （注册人姓氏的第一个字母）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2648">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2649">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2649">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2650">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2651">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2652">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2653">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2654">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2654">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2655">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2655">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2656">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2656">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2657">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2657">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2658">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2658">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2659">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2661">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2661">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2662">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2663">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2663">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2664">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2664">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2665">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2665">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2666">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2667">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2667">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2668">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2669">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2669">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2670">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2670">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2671">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2671">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2679">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2679">drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2687">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2687">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2688">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2689">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2689">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2690">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2691">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2691">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2692">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2692">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2693">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2693">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2694">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2694">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2695">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2695">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2697">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2697">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2700">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2700">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2701">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2701">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2702">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2702">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2703">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2703">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2736">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2736">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2737">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2737">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2739">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2739">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2740">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2741">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2741">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2742">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2743">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2743">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2744">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2745">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2745">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2746">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2746">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2747">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2747">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
