## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2754">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2754">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2756">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2756">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2757">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2758">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2758">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2759">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2760">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2760">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2761">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2762">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2762">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2763">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2763">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2764">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2764">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2765">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2765">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2766">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2766">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2767">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2767">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2768">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2768">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2769">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2769">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-2770">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-2770">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3209">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3209">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3210">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3210">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3211">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3212">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3212">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3213">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3214">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3214">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3215">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3215">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3216">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3216">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3217">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3217">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3218">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3219">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3219">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3220">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3222">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3222">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3223">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3223">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3228">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3228">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3229">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3229">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3230">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3230">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3231">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3231">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3235">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3235">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3236">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3236">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3237">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3237">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3239">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3239">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3240">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3241">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3241">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3242">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3243">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3243">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3244">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3244">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3245">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3245">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3246">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3246">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3250">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3251">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3251">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3252">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3252">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3258">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3258">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3261">健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3261">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3262">hälsokort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3262">hälsokort</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3267">sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3267">sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3270">芬兰国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3270">Finland national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3271">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3272">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3272">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3273">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3274">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3274">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3275">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3275">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3276">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3276">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3277">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3277">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3278">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3278">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3279">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3280">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3280">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3281">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3282">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3282">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3283">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3283">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3284">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3284">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3285">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3285">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3286">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3286">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3287">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3287">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3288">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3288">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3289">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3289">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3290">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3290">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3291">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3291">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3337">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3337">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3338">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3338">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3339">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3339">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3340">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3340">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3341">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3341">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3342">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3342">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3343">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3343">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3344">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3344">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3345">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3346">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3346">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3347">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3348">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3348">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3349">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3349">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3350">找到 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3350">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3351">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3351">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3352">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3352">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3353">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3353">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3354">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3354">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3355">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3355">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3356">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3356">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3357">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3358">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3358">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3359">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3360">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3360">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3361">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3361">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3362">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3362">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3363">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3363">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3364">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3364">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3365">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3365">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3366">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3366">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3367">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3367">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3368">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3369">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3369">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3370">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3371">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3371">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3372">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3372">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3373">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3373">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3374">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3374">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3375">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3375">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3399">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3399">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3400">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3400">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3401">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3402">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3402">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3403">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3404">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3404">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3405">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3405">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3406">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3406">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3407">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3407">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3408">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3408">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3409">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3409">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3410">至少满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3410">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3411">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3411">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3412">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3412">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3424">法国健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3424">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3426">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3426">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3428">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3428">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3429">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3429">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3430">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3430">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3431">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3431">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3432">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3432">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3433">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3433">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3434">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3435">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3436">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3437">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3438">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3438">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3439">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3439">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3440">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3440">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3441">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3441">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3442">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3442">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3443">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3443">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3444">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3444">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3445">法国国家标识卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3445">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3446">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3447">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3447">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3448">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3449">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3449">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3450">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3451">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3452">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3453">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3453">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3454">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3454">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3455">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3455">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3458">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3460">nationale d'idenite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3460">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3461">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3461">cni#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3464">国家/地区标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3464">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3465">国家标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3465">national identity</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3469">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3469">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3470">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3470">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3471">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3472">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3472">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3473">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3474">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3474">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3475">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3475">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3476">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3476">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3477">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3477">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3478">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3479">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3479">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3480">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3481">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3481">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3482">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3482">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3483">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3483">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3491">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3491">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3492">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3492">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3493">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3493">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3494">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3494">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3495">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3495">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3496">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3496">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3497">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3497">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3498">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3498">Passeport n °</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3500">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3500">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3501">Passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3501">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3502">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3502">PasseportNon</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3504">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3504">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3505">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3505">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3507">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3507">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3509">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3509">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3510">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3510">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3511">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3511">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3512">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3512">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3513">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3513">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3514">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3514">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3515">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3515">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3516">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3516">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3517">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3517">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3518">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3518">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3519">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3519">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3520">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3520">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3521">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3521">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3522">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3522">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3523">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3549">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3549">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3550">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3551">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3551">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3552">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3553">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3553">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3554">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3554">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3555">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3555">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3556">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3556">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3557">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3557">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3558">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3558">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3559">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3559">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3560">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3560">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3561">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3561">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3562">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3562">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3563">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3563">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3564">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3565">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3565">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3566">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3567">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3567">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3568">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3568">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3569">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3569">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3570">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3570">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3571">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3571">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3591">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3591">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3592">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3593">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3593">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3594">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3595">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3595">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3596">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3596">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3597">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3597">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3598">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3598">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3599">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3599">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3600">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3600">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3601">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3601">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3602">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3602">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3603">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3603">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3604">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3604">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3605">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3605">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3606">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3606">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3607">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3607">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3608">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3608">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3609">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3609">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3610">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3610">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3611">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3611">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3612">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3612">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3613">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3613">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3614">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3614">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3617">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3617">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3618">增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3618">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3619">siren 标识无 numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3619">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3620">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3620">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3621">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3621">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3623">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3623">numéro de tva</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3625">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3625">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3626">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3626">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3627">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3628">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3628">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3629">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3630">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3630">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3631">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3631">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3632">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3632">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3633">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3633">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3634">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3634">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3635">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3635">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3636">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3637">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3637">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3638">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3639">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3639">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3640">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3640">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3641">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3641">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3642">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3642">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3643">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3643">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3644">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3644">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3645">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3645">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3738">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3738">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3739">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3740">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3740">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3741">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3741">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3742">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3743">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3743">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3744">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3744">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3745">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3745">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3746">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3746">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3747">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3747">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3749">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3749">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3751">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3751">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3752">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3752">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3753">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3753">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3758">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3758">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3759">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3759">identifikation</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3769">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3769">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3770">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3770">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3771">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3772">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3772">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3773">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3774">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3774">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3775">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3775">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3776">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3776">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3777">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3777">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3778">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3778">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3779">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3780">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3781">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3782">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3782">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3783">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3783">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3784">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3784">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3785">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3786">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3786">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3787">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3787">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3788">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3788">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3789">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3807">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3807">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3808">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3808">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3809">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3809">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3810">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3810">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3811">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3811">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3812">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3812">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3813">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3813">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3814">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3814">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3815">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3815">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3816">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3816">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3817">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3817">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3818">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3818">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3819">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3819">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3820">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3821">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3821">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3822">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3823">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3823">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3824">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3824">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3825">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3825">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3826">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3826">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3827">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3827">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3853">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3853">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3854">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3855">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3855">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3856">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3857">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3857">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3858">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3858">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3859">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3859">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3860">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3860">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3861">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3861">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3862">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3862">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3863">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3863">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3864">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3864">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3865">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3865">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3867">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3870">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3870">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3871">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3871">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3872">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3873">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3873">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3874">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3875">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3875">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3876">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3876">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3877">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3877">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3878">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3878">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3879">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3879">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3880">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3880">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3881">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3881">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3882">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3882">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3883">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3883">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3884">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3884">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3885">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3886">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3886">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3887">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3888">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3888">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3889">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3890">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3890">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3891">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3892">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3893">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3893">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3894">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3894">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
