## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3911">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3911">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3912">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3912">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3913">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3913">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3914">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3914">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3915">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3915">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3916">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3916">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3917">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3917">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3918">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3918">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3919">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3919">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3920">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3920">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3921">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3921">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3922">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3922">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3923">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3924">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3924">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3925">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3926">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3926">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3927">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3927">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3928">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3928">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3929">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3929">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3930">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3930">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3931">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3931">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3932">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3932">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3935">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3935">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3936">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3936">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3937">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3937">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3938">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3938">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3939">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3939">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3940">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3940">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3941">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3941">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3942">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3942">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3943">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3944">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3944">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3945">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3945">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3946">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3946">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3947">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3947">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3948">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3948">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3949">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3949">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3950">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3950">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3951">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3951">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3952">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3952">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3959">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3959">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3960">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3961">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3961">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3962">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3963">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3963">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3964">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3965">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3965">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3966">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3967">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3967">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3968">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3968">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3969">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3969">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3998">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3998">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-3999">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-3999">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4000">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4000">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4001">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4001">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4002">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4002">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4003">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4003">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4004">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4004">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4005">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4005">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4006">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4007">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4007">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4008">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4009">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4009">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4010">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4010">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4011">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4011">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4012">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4012">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4013">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4013">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4014">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4014">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4015">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4015">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4054">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4054">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>

   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4055">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4055">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4056">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4056">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4057">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4058">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4058">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4059">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4060">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4060">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4061">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4061">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4062">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4062">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4063">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4064">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4064">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4065">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4066">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4066">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4067">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4067">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4068">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4068">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4084">匈牙利国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4084">Hungary national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4085">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4085">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4086">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4087">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4087">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4088">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4089">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4089">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4090">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4090">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4091">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4091">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4092">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4092">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4093">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4093">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4094">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4095">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4095">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4096">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4098">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4098">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4099">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4099">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4100">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4101">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4101">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4112">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4112">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4113">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4113">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4115">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4115">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4117">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4117">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4119">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4119">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4121">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4121">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4122">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4122">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4123">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4123">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4124">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4124">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4125">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4125">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4126">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4126">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4127">匈牙利语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4127">hungarian passport number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4130">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4130">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4131">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4133">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4133">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4135">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4135">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4136">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4137">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4137">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4138">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4139">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4140">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4140">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4141">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4141">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4142">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4143">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4143">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4144">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4144">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4145">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4145">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4146">匈牙利语社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4146">hungarian social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4147">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4147">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4148">socialsecuritynumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4148">socialsecuritynumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4149">hssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4149">hssn#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4163">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4163">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4164">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4164">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4165">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4166">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4166">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4167">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4168">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4168">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4169">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4169">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4170">与日期01/01/1867 之间的天数对应的五个数字和个人的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4170">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4171">三个数字，对应于通过机会区分在同一天的人所生成的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4171">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4172">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4172">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4173">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4174">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4174">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4175">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4176">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4176">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4177">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4177">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4178">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4178">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4179">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4179">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4180">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4180">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4206">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4206">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4207">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4208">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4208">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4209">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4210">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4210">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4211">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4211">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4212">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4212">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4213">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4213">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4215">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4217">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4218">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4218">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4219">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4219">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4220">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4220">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4221">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4221">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4235"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4235">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4237">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4237">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4238">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4239">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4239">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4240">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4240">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4241">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4241">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4242">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4242">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4244">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4244">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4247">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4247">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4248">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4248">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4249">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4249">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4250">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4250">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4251">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4251">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4252">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4252">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4253">蛋糕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4253">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4254">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4254">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4256">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4256">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4257">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4258">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4258">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4259">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4259">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4260">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4260">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4261">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4261">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4262">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4262">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4263">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4263">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4264">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4264">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4265">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4265">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4266">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4266">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4267">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4267">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4268">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4268">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4269">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4269">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4270">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4270">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4271">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4271">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4272">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4272">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4273">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4273">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4274">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4274">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4275">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4275">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4276">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4276">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4277">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4277">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4278">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4278">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4279">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4279">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4280">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4280">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4282">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4282">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4283">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4284">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4284">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4285">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4285">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4286">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4286">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4287">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4287">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4288">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4288">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4289">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4289">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4290">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4290">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4291">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4291">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4292">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4292">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4293">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4294">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4294">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4295">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4296">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4297">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4297">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4298">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4298">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4299">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4299">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4300">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4300">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4301">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4301">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4302">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4302">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4303">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4303">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4304"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4304">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4305">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4305">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4306">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4306">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4307">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4307">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4308">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4308">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4309">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4309">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4310">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4310">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4311">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4311">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4312">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4312">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-p131">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-p131">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4315">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4315">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4316">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4317">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4317">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4318">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4319">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4319">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4320">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4320">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4321">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4321">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4322">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4322">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4323">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4323">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4324">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4324">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4325">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4325">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4326">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4326">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4327">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4327">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4328">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4328">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4329">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4330">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4330">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4331">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4332">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4332">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4333">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4333">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4334">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4334">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4335">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4336">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4336">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4337">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4337">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4338">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4338">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4339">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4339">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4340">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4340">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4341">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4341">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4342">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4342">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4344">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4344">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4346">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4346">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4347">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4348">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4348">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4349">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4350">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4350">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4351">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4351">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4352">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4352">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4353">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4353">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4354">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4354">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4355">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4355">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4356">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4356">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4357">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4357">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4358">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4358">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4359">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4359">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4360">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4360">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4361">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4361">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4362">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4362">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4363">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4363">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4364">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4364">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4365"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4365">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4366">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4366">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4367">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4368">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4368">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4369">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4370">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4370">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4371">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4371">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4372">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4372">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4373">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4373">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4374">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4374">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4375">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4375">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4376">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4376">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4377">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4377">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4378">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4378">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4379">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4380">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4380">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4381">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4381">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4382">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4382">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4383">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4383">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4384">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4384">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4385">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4385">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4386">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4386">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4387">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4387">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4388">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4389">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4389">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4391">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4391">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4392">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4392">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4393">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4393">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4395">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4395">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4397">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4397">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4398">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4398">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4399">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4399">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4415">爱尔兰国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4415">Ireland national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4416">此敏感信息类型实体仅包含在欧盟国家/地区标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4416">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4417">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4418">指定模式中的字母、数字和空格的九个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4418">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4419">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4420">指定模式中的字母、数字和空格的九个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4420">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4421">从01年1月2013到现在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4421">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4422">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4422">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4423">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4423">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4424">一个空格或大写的字母 "W" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4424">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4425">在01月1日之前1月2013：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4425">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4426">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4426">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4427">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4427">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4428">一个空格或大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4428">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4430">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4430">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4432">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4433">函数找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4433">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4434">找到了中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4434">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4435">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4435">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4436">函数找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4436">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4465">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4465">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4466">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4468">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4468">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4469">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4470">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4470">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4471">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4471">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4472">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4472">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4473">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4474">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4474">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4475">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4476">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4476">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4477">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4477">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4478">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4478">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4481">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4481">passport number</span></span>
