## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4488">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4488">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4489">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4490">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4490">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4491">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4491">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4492">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4492">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4493">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4493">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4494">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4494">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4495">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4495">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4496">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4496">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4497">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4497">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4498">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4498">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4499">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4499">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4500">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4500">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4501">字母 "A" 或 "H" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4501">the letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4503">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4503">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4505">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4505">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4506">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4506">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4507">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4507">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4508">找到 Keyword_ireland_pps 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4508">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4509">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4509">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4510">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4511">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4511">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4512">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4512">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4513">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4513">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4515">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4515">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4516">Personal Public Service Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4516">Personal Public Service Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4518">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4518">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4519">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4519">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4520">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4520">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4521">.PPS#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4521">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4522">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4522">PPSN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4523">Public Services Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4523">Public Services Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4524">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4524">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4525">Uimh.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4525">Uimh.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4526">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4526">PSP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4527">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4527">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4528">爱尔兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4528">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4529">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4531">七位数字后跟一个不带空格或分隔符的字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4531">seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4533">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4533">seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4534">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4534">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4535">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4535">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4536">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4537">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4537">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4538">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4539">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4539">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4540">函数  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4540">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4541">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4541">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4542">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4543">函数  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4543">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4544">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4544">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4545">Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4545">Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4546">客户端标识服务</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4546">client identity service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4547">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4547">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4548">个人 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4548">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4549">个人公开服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4549">personal public service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4550">个人服务编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4550">personal service no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4551">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4551">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4552">pps no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4552">pps no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4553">pps 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4553">pps number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4559">公共服务编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4559">public service no</span></span>

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4572">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4572">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4573">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4574">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4574">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4575">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4576">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4576">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4577">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4577">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4578">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4578">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4579">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4579">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4580">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4580">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4581">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4581">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4582">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4582">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4583">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4583">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4585">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4587">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4588">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4588">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4589">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4589">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4590">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4590">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4591">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4591">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4592">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4592">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4593">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4593">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4594">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4594">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4595">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4595">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4596">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4596">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4598">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4598">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4599">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4600">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4600">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4601">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4602">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4602">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4603">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4604">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4605">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4605">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4606">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4606">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4607">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4607">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4608">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4608">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4609">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4609">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4610">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4610">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4611">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4611">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4612">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4612">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4613">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4613">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4614">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4615">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4615">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4616">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4616">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4617">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4617">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4618">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4618">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4619">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4619">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4620">七个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4620">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4621">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4621">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4622">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4623">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4623">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4624">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4625">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4625">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4626">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4626">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4627">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4627">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4628">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4628">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4629">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4629">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4630">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4630">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4631">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4631">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4632">意大利国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4632">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4633">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4634">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4635">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4635">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4636">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4637">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4637">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4638">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4638">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4639">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4639">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4640">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4640">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4641">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4641">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4642">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4642">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4643">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4643">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4644">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4644">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4645">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4646">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4646">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4647">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4648">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4648">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4649">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4649">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4650">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4650">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4651">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4652">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4652">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4687">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4687">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4688">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4690">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4690">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4692">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4692">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4693">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4693">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4694">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4694">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4695">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4695">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4696">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4696">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4697">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4697">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4698">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4698">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4699">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4699">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4700">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4700">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4712">意大利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4712">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4713">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4713">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4714">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4715">指定模式中的16个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4715">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4716">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4717">16个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4717">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4718">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4718">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4719">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4719">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4720">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4720">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4721">一个与出生月份对应的数字（字母按字母顺序使用），但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，在一月份为 A 和10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4721">one digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4722">两个数字，对应于出生月份中的某一天，其中40将添加到偶数的出生日，以区别于奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4722">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4723">与某人出生的 municipality 特定的区号相对应的四个数字（国家/地区代码用于外国国家/地区）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4723">four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4724">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4724">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4726">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4726">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4728">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4728">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4729">函数  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4729">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4730">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4730">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4731">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4731">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4732">函数  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4732">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4767">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4767">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4768">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4769">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4769">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4770">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4771">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4771">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4772">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4772">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4773">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4773">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4774">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4774">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4775">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4775">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4776">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4777">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4777">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4778">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4779">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4779">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4780">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4780">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4781">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4781">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4782">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4783">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4783">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4784">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4784">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4785">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4785">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4786">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4786">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4788">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4788">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4789">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4789">iva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4790">iva#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4790">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4791">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4791">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4793">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4793">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4795">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4795">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4796">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4796">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4797">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4797">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4798">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4798">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4799">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4799">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4800">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4800">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4802">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4804">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4804">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4805">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4805">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4806">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4806">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4807">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4807">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4808">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4808">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4809">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4810">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4811">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4811">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4812">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4812">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4871">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4871">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4873">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4873">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4874">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4875">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4875">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4876">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4877">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4878">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4879">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4880">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4880">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4881">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4909">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4909">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4910">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4911">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4911">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4912">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4913">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4913">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4914">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4914">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4915">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4915">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4916">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4917">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4917">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4918">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4919">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4920">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4920">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4921">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4921">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4922">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4923">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4923">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4936">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4936">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4938">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4938">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4939">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4940">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4940">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4941">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4941">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4942">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4942">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4943">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4943">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4944">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4944">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4945">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4945">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4946">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4947">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4947">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4948">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4949">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4949">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4950">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4950">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4951">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4951">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4952">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4952">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4953">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4953">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4961">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4961">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4966">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4966">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4968">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4968">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4969">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4970">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4970">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4971">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4972">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4972">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4973">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4974">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4974">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4975">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4975">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4976">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4976">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4983">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4983">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4984">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4985">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4985">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4986">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4986">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4987">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4987">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4988">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4988">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4989">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4989">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4990">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4990">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4991">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4991">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4992">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4992">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4993">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4993">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4994">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4994">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4995">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4995">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4996">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4996">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4997">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4997">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4998">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4998">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-4999">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-4999">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5000">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5000">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5001">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5001">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5002">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5002">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5003">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5003">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5005">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5005">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5007">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5007">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5008">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5009">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5012">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5012">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5013">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5013">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5027">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5027">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5028">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5029">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5029">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5030">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5030">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5031">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5031">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5032">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5032">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5033">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5033">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5034">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5034">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5035">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5035">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5036">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5036">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5037">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5037">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5038">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5038">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5039">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5039">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5040">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5040">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5041">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5041">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5042">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5043">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5043">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5044">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5044">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5045">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5045">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5046">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5046">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5047">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5047">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5048">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5048">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5049">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5049">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5050">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5050">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5051">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5051">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5052">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5052">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5053">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5053">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5054">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5055">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5055">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5057">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5057">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5058">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5058">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5059">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5059">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5060">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5061">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5061">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5062">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5063">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5063">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5064">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5064">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5065">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5065">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5071">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5071">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5072">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5072">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5073">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5073">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5077">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5077">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5078">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5078">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5079">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5079">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5081">拉脱维亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5081">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5082">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5082">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5083">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5084">11位数字和指定格式的连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5084">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5085">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5086">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5086">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5087">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5087">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5088">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5088">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5089">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5089">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5090">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5090">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5091">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5092">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5092">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5093">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5094">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5094">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5095">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5095">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5096">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5096">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5098">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5098">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
