## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5161">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5161">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5162">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5162">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5164">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5164">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5166">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5166">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5167">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5167">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5168">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5168">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5170">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5172">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5173">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5173">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5174">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5174">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5175">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5175">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5176">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5176">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5177">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5177">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5178">拉脱维亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5178">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5179">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5179">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5180">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5180">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5181">拉脱维亚税标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5181">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5182">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5182">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5184">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5184">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5186">指定模式中的11位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5186">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5187">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (DDMMYY) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5187">six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5188">一个与 "出生世纪" 相对应的数字，其中 "0" 对应于19世纪，"1" 对应于20世纪，"2" 对应于21世纪。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5188">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5189">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5189">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5190">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5190">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5191">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5191">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5192">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5192">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5193">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5193">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5194">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5194">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5195">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5195">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5196">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5196">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5197">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5197">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5260">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5260">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5261">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5261">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5262">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5263">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5263">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5264">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5264">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5265">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5265">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5266">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5267">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5267">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5268">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5269">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5270">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5270">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5271">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5271">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5287">立陶宛国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5287">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5288">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5288">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5289">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5290">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5290">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5291">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5292">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5292">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5293">一个与人的性别和出生世纪对应的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5293">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5294">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5294">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5295">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5295">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5296">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5296">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5298">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5298">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5300">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5300">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5301">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5301">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5302">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5302">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5303">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5304">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5304">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5339">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5339">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5340">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5340">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5341">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5341">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5342">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5342">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5343">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5343">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5344">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5344">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5345">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5346">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5346">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5347">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5348">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5348">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5349">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5349">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5350">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5350">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5351">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5351">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5352">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5352">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5353">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5353">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5354">lithunian 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5354">lithunian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5355">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5355">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5356">paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5356">paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5357">立陶宛税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5357">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5358">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5358">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5359">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5360">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5360">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5361">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5362">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5362">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5363">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5364">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5364">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5365">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5366">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5367">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5367">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5368">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5368">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5369">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5370">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5370">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5404">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5404">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5405">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5405">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5406">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5406">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5407">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5407">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5408">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5408">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5409">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5409">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5410">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5411">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5411">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5412">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5413">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5414">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5414">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5415">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5415">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->

          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5431">Luxemburg 国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5431">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5432">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5432">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5433">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5434">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5434">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5435">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5436">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5436">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5437">一个与人的性别和出生世纪对应的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5437">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5438">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5438">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5439">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5439">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5440">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5440">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5441">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5442">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5442">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5443">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5444">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5445">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5445">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5446">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5446">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5469">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5469">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5470">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5470">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5471">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5472">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5472">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5473">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5474">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5474">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5475">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5476">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5476">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5477">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5478">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5478">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5479">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5479">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5480">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5480">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5487">Luxemburg 税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5487">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5488">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5488">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5489">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5490">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5490">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5491">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5491">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5492">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5492">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5493">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5493">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5494">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5494">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5495">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5496">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5496">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5497">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5498">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5498">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5499">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5499">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5500">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5500">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5501">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5502">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5502">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5542">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5542">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5543">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5544">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5544">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5545">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5546">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5546">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5547">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5547">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5548">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5548">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5549">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5549">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5550">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5550">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5551">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5551">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5552">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5552">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5553">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5554">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5555">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5556">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5556">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5557">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5557">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5558">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5558">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5585">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5585">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5586">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5586">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5587">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5588">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5588">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5589">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5590">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5590">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5591">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5591">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5592">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5592">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5593">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5593">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5594">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5594">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5595">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5595">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5596">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5597">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5598">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5599">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5600">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5600">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5601">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5601">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5614">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5614">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5617">马耳他国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5617">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5618">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5618">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5619">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5619">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5620">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5620">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5621">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5621">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5622">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5622">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5623">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5623">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5624">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5624">one uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5625">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5625">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5626">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5626">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5627">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5627">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5628">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5629">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5629">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5630">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5630">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5631">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5631">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5632">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5632">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5633">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5633">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5634">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5634">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5649">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5649">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5650">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5650">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5651">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5652">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5652">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5653">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5654">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5654">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5655">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5655">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5656">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5656">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5657">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5657">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5658">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5659">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5659">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5660">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5660">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5661">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5661">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5662">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5662">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5663">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5663">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5664">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5664">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5665">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5665">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5666">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5666">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5667">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5667">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5668">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5668">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5669">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5669">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5670">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5670">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5671">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5671">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5672">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5672">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5673">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5673">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5674">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5675">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5675">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5676">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5676">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5677">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5677">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5678">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5678">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5679">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5679">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5681">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5681">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5683">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5684">函数  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5684">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5685">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5685">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5686">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5686">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5687">函数  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5687">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5720">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5720">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5721">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5722">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5722">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5723">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5724">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5724">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5725">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5725">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5726">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5726">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5727">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5727">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5728">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5728">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5729">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5729">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5730">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5731">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5732">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5733">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5733">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5734">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5734">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5735">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5735">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5736">函数 Func_eu_date2 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5736">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5737">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5738">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5738">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5761">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5761">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5762">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5762">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5764">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5764">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5765">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5766">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5766">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5768">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5768">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5770">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5771">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5771">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5772">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5772">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5790">荷兰国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5790">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5791">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5791">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5793">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5793">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5795">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5795">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5796">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5797">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5797">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5798">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5799">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5800">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5800">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5801">找到了中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5801">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5802">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5802">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5803">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5803">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5827">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5827">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5828">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5828">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5830">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5830">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5831">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5832">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5832">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5833">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5834">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5834">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5835">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5836">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5837">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5837">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5838">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5838">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5848">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5848">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5849">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5849">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5850">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5851">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5851">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5852">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5853">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5853">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5854">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5855">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5855">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5856">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5857">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5858">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5858">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5859">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5859">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5860">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5860">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5861">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5861">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5899">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5899">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5900">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5901">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5901">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5902">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5903">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5903">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5904">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5904">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5905">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5905">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5906">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5906">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5907">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5907">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5908">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5908">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5909">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5909">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5910">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5910">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5911">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5912">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5912">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5913">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5914">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5914">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5915">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5915">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5916">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5916">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5917">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5918">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5918">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5925">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5925">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5927">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5927">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5928">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5929">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5929">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5930">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5931">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5931">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5932">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5932">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5933">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5933">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5934">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5934">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5935">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5935">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5936">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5936">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5937">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5937">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5938">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5938">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5939">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5939">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5941">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5941">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5943">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5944">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5944">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5945">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5945">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5946">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5947">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5947">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5948">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5948">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5949">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5949">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5950">帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5950">account number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5951">银行帐户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5951">bank account</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5955">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5955">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5956">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5956">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5957">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5957">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5958">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5958">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5959">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5959">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5960">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5960">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5961">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5961">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5962">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5963">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5964">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5965">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5965">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5966">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5966">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5967">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5967">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5968">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5968">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-5969">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-5969">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
