## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6036">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6036">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6038">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6038">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6039">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6040">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6040">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6041">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6041">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6042">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6042">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6043">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6043">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6044">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6044">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6045">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6045">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6046">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6047">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6047">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6048">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6049">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6049">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6050">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6050">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6051">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6051">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6052">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6052">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6053">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6053">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6062">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6062">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6063">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6064">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6064">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6065">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6066">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6066">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6067">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6067">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6068">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6068">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6069">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6069">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6070">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6070">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6071">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6071">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6072">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6072">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6073">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6073">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6074">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6074">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6075">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6075">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6076">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6076">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6077">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6077">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6078">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6078">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6079">治疗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6079">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6080">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6080">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6081">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6082">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6082">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6083">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6084">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6084">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6085">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6085">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6086">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6086">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6087">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6087">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6088">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6088">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6089">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6089">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6090">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6090">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6091">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6091">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6092">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6092">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6093">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6093">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6094">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6094">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6095">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6095">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6096">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6096">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6097">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6097">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6098">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6098">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6099">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6099">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6100">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6100">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6101">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6101">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6102">社会 welfare 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6102">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6103">社会 welfare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6103">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6104">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6104">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6105">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6105">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6106">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6107">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6107">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6108">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6108">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6109">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6109">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6110">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6110">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6111">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6111">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6112">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6112">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6113">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6114">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6115">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6116">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6116">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6117">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6117">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6118">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6118">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6119">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6119">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6120">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6120">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6121">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6121">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6122">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6123">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6123">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6124">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6124">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6125">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6125">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6126">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6126">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6127">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6127">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6128">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6128">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6129">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6129">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6130">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6130">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6131">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6131">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6133">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6133">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6135">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6135">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6136">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6136">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6137">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6137">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6138">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6138">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6139">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6139">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6140">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6140">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6141">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6142">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6143">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6144">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6144">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6145">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6145">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6146">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6146">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6147">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6147">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6148">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6148">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6149">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6149">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6150">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6150">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6151">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6151">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6152">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6152">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6153">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6153">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6154">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6154">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6155">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6156">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6156">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6157">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6158">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6158">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6159">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6159">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6160">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6160">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6161">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6161">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6162">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6162">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6163">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6163">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6164">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6165">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6165">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6166">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6167">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6167">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6168">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6168">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6169">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6169">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6185">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6185">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6186">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6186">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6187">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6187">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6188">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6188">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6189">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6189">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6190">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6190">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6191">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6191">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6192">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6192">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6193">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6194">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6194">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6195">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6195">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6196">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6196">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6198">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6198">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6199">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6199">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6200">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6200">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6201">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6201">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6202">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6202">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6203">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6203">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6204">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6204">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6205">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6205">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6206">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6206">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6207">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6207">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6208">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6208">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6210">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6210">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6211">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6212">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6212">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6213">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6214">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6215">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6216">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6216">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6217">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6217">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6218">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6218">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6219">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6220">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6220">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6221">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6221">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6222">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6222">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6223">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6223">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6224">niepowtarzalny 器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6224">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6225">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6225">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6226">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6226">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6227">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6227">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6228">器 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6228">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6229">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6229">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6230">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6230">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6231">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6231">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6232">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6232">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6234">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6234">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6235">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6236">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6236">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6237">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6238">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6238">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6239">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6240">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6240">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6241">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6241">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6242">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6242">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6243">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6244">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6244">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6245">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6245">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6249">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6249">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6250">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6250">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6251">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6252">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6252">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6253">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6254">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6254">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6255">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6255">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6256">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6256">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6257">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6257">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6258">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6258">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6259">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6260">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6260">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6261">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6262">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6262">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6263">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6263">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6264">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6264">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6265">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6265">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6266">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6266">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6267">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6267">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6268">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6268">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6269">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6269">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6270">统计数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6270">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6271">统计 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6271">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6272">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6272">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6273">regon 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6273">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6274">regonid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6274">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6275">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6275">regonno#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6283">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6283">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6284">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6284">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6286">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6286">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6288">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6288">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6289">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6290">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6291">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6292">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6292">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6293">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6293">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6294">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6294">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6295">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6296">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6296">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6326">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6326">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6327">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6327">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6328">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6328">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6330">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6330">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6332">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6332">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6333">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6334">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6335">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6336">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6336">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6337">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6337">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6338">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6338">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6358">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6358">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6359">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6359">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6360">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6360">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6361">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6361">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6362">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6362">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6363">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6363">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6364">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6364">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6365">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6365">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6366">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6366">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6367">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6367">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6368">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6368">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6369">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6370">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6370">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6371">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6372">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6372">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6373">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6373">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6374">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6374">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6375">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6375">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6376">Keywords_portugal_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6376">Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6377">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6377">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6379">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6379">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6380">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6380">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6381">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6381">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6382">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6382">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6383">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6383">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6384">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6384">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6385">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6385">driver's license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6388">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6388">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6390">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6390">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6391">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6391">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6393">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6393">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6394">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6395">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6395">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6396">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6396">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6397">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6397">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6398">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6399">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6399">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6400">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6401">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6402">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6402">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6403">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6403">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6404">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6404">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6405">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6405">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6406">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6406">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6408">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6408">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6409">número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6409">número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6410">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6410">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6411">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6411">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6412">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6412">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6413">9个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6413">nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6414">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6414">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6415">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6415">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6416">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6416">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6417">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6417">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6418">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6418">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6419">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6419">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6420">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6420">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6421">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6421">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6422">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6422">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6423">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6423">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6448">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6448">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6449">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6449">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6450">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6450">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6451">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6451">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6452">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6452">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6453">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6453">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6454">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6454">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6455">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6455">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6457">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6457">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6459">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6459">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6460">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6460">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6461">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6461">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6477">罗马尼亚国家身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6477">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6478">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6478">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6479">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6480">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6480">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6481">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6482">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6482">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6483">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6484">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6484">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6485">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6486">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6486">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6487">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6487">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6488">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6488">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6489">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6489">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6541">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6541">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6542">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6542">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6543">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6544">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6544">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6545">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6546">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6546">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6547">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6548">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6549">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6550">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6551">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6551">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6552">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6552">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6559">罗马尼亚税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6559">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6560">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6562">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6562">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6564">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6564">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6565">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6566">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6566">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6567">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6568">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6569">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6569">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6570">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6570">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6621">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6621">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6623">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6623">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6624">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6625">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6625">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6626">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6626">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6627">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6627">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6628">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6628">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6629">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6629">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6630">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6630">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6631">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6632">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6632">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6633">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6634">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6634">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6635">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6635">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6636">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6636">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6653">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6653">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6655">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6655">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6657">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6657">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6658">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6658">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6659">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6659">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6660">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6660">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6661">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6662">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6662">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6663">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6664">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6665">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6665">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6666">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6666">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6683">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6683">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6684">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6684">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6685">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6685">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6686">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6686">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6687">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6687">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6689">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6689">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6692">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6692">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6693">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6693">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6694">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6694">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6695">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6695">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>
