- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6698">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6698">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6699">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6699">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6700">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6700">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6701">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6702">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6702">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6703">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6703">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6704">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6704">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6705">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6705">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6706">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6706">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6707">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6707">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6708">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6709">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6710">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6711">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6711">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6712">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6712">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6713">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6713">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6714">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6715">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6715">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6716">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6716">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6717">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6717">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6728">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6728">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6729">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6730">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6731">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6731">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6732">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6733">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6733">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6734">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6734">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6735">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6735">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6736">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6737">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6738">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6739">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6739">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6740">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6740">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6741">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6741">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6757">斯洛伐克国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6757">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6758">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6758">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6759">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6759">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6760">10个数字，包含一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6760">ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6761">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6761">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6762">10个数字，包含一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6762">ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6764">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6764">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6766">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6767">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6767">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6768">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6768">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6769">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6770">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6770">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6817">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6817">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6818">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6818">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6820">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6820">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6822">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6822">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6823">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6824">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6824">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6825">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6826">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6826">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6827">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6827">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6828">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6828">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6831">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6831">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6833">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6833">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6835">斯洛伐克纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6835">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6836">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6836">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6838">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6838">ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6840">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6840">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6841">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6841">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6842">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6842">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6843">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6843">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6844">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6844">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6845">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6845">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6846">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6846">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6893">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6893">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6894">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6894">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6896">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6896">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6898">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6898">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6899">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6899">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6900">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6900">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6901">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6901">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6902">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6903">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6903">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6904">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6904">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6920">斯洛文尼亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6920">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6921">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6921">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6923">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6923">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6924">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6925">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6925">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6926">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6926">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6927">与出生区域对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6927">two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6928">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6928">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6929">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6929">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6930">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6931">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6931">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6932">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6933">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6934">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6934">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6935">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6935">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6936">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6936">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6937">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6937">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6965">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6965">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6966">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6966">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6968">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6969">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6970">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6971">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6972">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6973">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6975">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6977">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6978">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6979">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6979">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6981">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6981">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6982">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6982">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6983">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6983">slovenian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6984">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6984">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6985">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6985">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6986">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6986">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6987">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6987">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6988">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6989">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6989">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6990">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6991">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6991">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6992">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6992">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6993">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6993">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6994">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6994">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6995">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6995">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6996">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6996">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6997">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6997">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6998">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6998">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-6999">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-6999">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7023">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7023">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7024">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7025">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7025">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7026">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7027">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7027">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7028">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7028">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7029">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7029">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7030">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7030">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7031">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7031">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7032">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7032">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7033">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7034">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7034">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7035">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7036">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7036">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7037">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7037">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7038">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7038">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7039">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7039">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7045">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7045">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7046">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7047">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7047">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7048">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7049">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7049">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7050">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7050">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7051">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7051">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7052">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7052">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7053">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7053">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7054">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7054">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7055">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7055">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7056">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7057">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7057">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7058">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7059">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7059">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7060">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7060">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7061">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7061">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7062">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7062">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7063">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7063">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7064">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7064">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7065">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7066">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7066">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7067">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7067">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7068">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7068">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7069">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7069">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7070">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7070">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7071">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7071">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7072">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7072">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7073">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7073">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7074">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7074">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7075">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7075">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7076">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7076">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7077">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7077">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7078">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7078">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7079">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7079">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7080">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7080">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7081">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7082">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7082">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7083">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7085">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7085">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7086">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7086">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7123">西班牙国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7123">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7124">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7124">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7125">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7126">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7126">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7127">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7128">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7128">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7129">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7129">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7130">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7130">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7131">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7132">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7132">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7133">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7134">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7135">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7135">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7136">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7136">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7137">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7137">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7138">Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7138">Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7139">carné de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7139">carné de identidad</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7160">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7160">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7161">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7161">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7162">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7162">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7163">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7163">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7164">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7164">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7165">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7165">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7166">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7166">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7167">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7167">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7168">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7168">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7170">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7170">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7172">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7173">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7173">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7174">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7174">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7179">护照书籍</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7179">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7180">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7180">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7186"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7186">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7187">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7187">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7189">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7189">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7190">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7191">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7191">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7192">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7192">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7193">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7193">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7194">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7194">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7195">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7195">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7196">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7196">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7197">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7198">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7198">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7199">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7200">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7200">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7201">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7201">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7202">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7202">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7203">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7203">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7204">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7204">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7205">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7205">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7206">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7206">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7207">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7208">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7208">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7209">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7210">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7210">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7211">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7211">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7212">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7212">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7213">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7213">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7214">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7214">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7215">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7215">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7216">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7216">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7217">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7217">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7218">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7218">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7219">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7219">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7220">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7220">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7221">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7221">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7222">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7222">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7223">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7223">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7224">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7224">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7225">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7225">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7226">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7226">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7227">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7227">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7228">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7228">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7229">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7230">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7230">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7231">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7232">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7232">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7233">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7233">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7234">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7234">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7235">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7235">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7236">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7236">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7237">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7237">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7238">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7238">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7239">cif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7239">cif</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7240">cifid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7240">cifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7241">cifnúmero#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7241">cifnúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7242">número de contribuyente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7242">número de contribuyente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7243">número de identificación 会计</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7243">número de identificación fiscal</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7267">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7267">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7269">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7269">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7270">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7271">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7271">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7272">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7272">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7273">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7273">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7274">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7274">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7275">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7275">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7276">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7276">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7277">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7277">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7278">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7279">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7279">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7280">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7281">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7281">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7282">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7282">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7283">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7283">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7284">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7284">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7285">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7285">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7286">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7286">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7287">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7287">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7288">部分密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7288">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7289">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7289">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7290">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7290">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7291">采用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7291">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7292">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7292">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7293"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7293">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7294">密码或密码后跟0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 空格和一个星号 ( \* ) --或--------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7294">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7295">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7295">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7296">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7296">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7297">小于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7297">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7298">1-200 个字符的任意组合，这些字符为大写或小写字母、数字、星号 ( \* ) 、连字符 ( ) 、下划线 (_) 或空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7298">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7299">大于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7299">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7300">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7300">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7301"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7301">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7302">尚未</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7302">contoso</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7313">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7313">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7314">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7314">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7315">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7316">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7316">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7317">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7318">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7318">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7319">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7319">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7320">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7320">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7321">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7321">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7322">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7323">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7323">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7324">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7325">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7325">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7326">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7326">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7327">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7328">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7328">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7329">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7329">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7333">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7333">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7334">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7334">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7335">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7335">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7343">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7343">Sweden national ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7344">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7344">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7345">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7346">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7346">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7347">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7348">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7348">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7349">2到4位 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7349">two to four digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7350">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7350">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7351">分隔符 "-" 或 "+" (可选) ，外加</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7351">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7352">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7352">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7353">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7354">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7354">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7355">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7357">函数 Func_swedish_national_identifier 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7357">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7358">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7359">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7359">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7360">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7360">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7361">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7361">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7362">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7362">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7363">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7363">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7364">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7364">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7365">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7365">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7366">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7366">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7367">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7368">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7368">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7369">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7370">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7370">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7371">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7371">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7372">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7372">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7373">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7373">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7374">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7374">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
