## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7405">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7405">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7406">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7407">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7408">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7408">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7409">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7410">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7410">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7411">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7411">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7412">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7412">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7413">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7413">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7414">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7414">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7415">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7415">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7416">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7416">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7417">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7417">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7418">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7418">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7419">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7419">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7420">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7420">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7421">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7421">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7422">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7422">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7423">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7423">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7429">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7429">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7430">标识否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7430">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7431">个人标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7431">personal identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7432">personnummer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7432">personnummer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7433">personligt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7433">personligt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7434">unikt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7434">unikt id-nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7436">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7436">identifikationsnumret</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7437">personnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7437">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7438">identifikationsnumret#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7438">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7439">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7439">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7440">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7440">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7441">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7442">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7442">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7443">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7444">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7444">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7445">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7445">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7446">加号、减号或反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7446">a plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7447">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7447">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7448">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7448">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7449">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7449">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7450">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7450">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7451">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7452">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7452">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7453">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7454">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7455">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7455">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7456">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7456">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7457">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7458">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7458">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7484">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7484">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7486">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7486">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7487">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7488">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7488">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7489">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7489">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7490">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7490">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7491">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7491">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7492">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7492">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7493">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7493">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7494">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7495">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7495">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7496">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7497">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7497">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7498">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7498">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7499">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7499">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7533">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7533">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7534">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7534">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7535">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7535">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7536">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7536">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7537">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7537">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7538">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7538">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7539">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7539">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7540">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7540">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7541">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7541">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7542">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7542">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7543">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7543">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7544">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7544">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7545">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7546">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7546">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7547">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7548">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7548">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7549">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7549">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7550">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7550">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7551">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7551">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7552">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7552">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7570">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7570">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7571">标识 personnelle id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7571">identification personnelle id</span></span>

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7572">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7573">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7573">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7574">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7575">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7575">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7576">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7577">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7577">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7578">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7578">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7579">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7579">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7580">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7580">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7581">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7582">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7582">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7583">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7584">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7585">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7585">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7586">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7586">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7587">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7587">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7588">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7589">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7589">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7590">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7590">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7596">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7596">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7599">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7599">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7600">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7600">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7602">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7602">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7603">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7603">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7604">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7604">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7605">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7605">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7606">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7606">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7607">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7607">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7608">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7608">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7609">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7609">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7610">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7610">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7611">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7611">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7612">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7612">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7613">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7613">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7614">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7614">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7615">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7615">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7616">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7616">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7617">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7618">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7619">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7620">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7621">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7621">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7622">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7622">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7632">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7632">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7633">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7633">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7634">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7635">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7635">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7636">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7637">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7637">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7638">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7638">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7639">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7639">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7640">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7641">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7641">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7642">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7643">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7644">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7644">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7645">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7645">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7646">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7646">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7647">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7647">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7648">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7648">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7649">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7649">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7650">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7650">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7651">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7651">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7652">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7652">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7653">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7653">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7654">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7654">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7655">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7655">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7656">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7656">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7657">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7657">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7658">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7658">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7659">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7659">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7661">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7661">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7662">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7663">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7663">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7664">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7664">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7665">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7665">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7666">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7667">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7667">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7668">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7669">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7669">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7670">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7670">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7671">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7671">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7672">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7673">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7673">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7674">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7674">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7682">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7682">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7684">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7684">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7686">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7686">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7687">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7688">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7688">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7689">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7690">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7691">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7691">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7692">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7692">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7693">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7694">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7694">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7695">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7695">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7696">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7696">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7699">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7699">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7700">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7700">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7701">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7701">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7702">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7702">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7703">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7703">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7705">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7705">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7707">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7707">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7708">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7708">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7709">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7709">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7710">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7710">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7711">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7711">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7712">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7712">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7714">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7716">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7716">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7717">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7717">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7718">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7718">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7719">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7719">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7727">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7727">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7728">tricycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7728">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7729">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7729">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7730">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7730">photocard licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7735">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7735">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7736">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7736">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7737">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7737">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7738">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7738">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7739">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7740">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7740">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7741">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7741">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7742">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7742">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7743">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7744">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7744">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7745">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7746">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7747">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7747">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7748">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7748">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7749">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7749">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7755">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7755">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7756">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7756">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7758">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7758">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7760">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7760">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7761">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7761">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7762">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7762">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7763">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7763">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7764">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7764">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7765">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7765">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7766">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7767">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7767">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7768">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7769">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7769">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7770">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7770">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7771">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7771">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7772">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7772">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7773">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7773">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7774">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7774">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7775">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7776">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7776">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7777">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7777">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7778">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7778">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7779">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7779">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7780">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7780">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7781">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7781">health authority</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7793">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7793">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7794">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7794">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7795">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7795">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7796">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7797">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7797">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7798">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7799">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7799">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7800"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7800">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7801">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7801">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7802">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7802">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7803">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7803">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7804">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7804">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7805">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7805">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7806">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7806">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7807">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7807">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7808">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7808">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7809">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7809">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7810">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7810">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7811">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7811">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7812">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7812">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7813">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7813">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7814">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7814">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7815">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7815">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7816">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7816">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7817">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7817">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7818">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7818">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7819">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7820">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7820">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7821">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7821">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7843">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7843">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7844">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7844">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7845">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7845">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7846">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7846">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7847">唯一纳税人引用 (UTR) ：不带空格和分隔符的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7847">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7848">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7848">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7849">唯一纳税人引用 (UTR) ：10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7849">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7851">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7853">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7853">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7854">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7854">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7855">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7855">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7875">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7875">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7877">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7877">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7878">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7879">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7879">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7880">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7881">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7881">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7882">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7883">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7884">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7884">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7885">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7885">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7886">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7886">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_usa_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7887">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7887">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7888">Checking Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7888">Checking Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7889">Checking Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7889">Checking Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7890">Checking Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7890">Checking Account #</span></span>

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7915">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7915">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7916">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7916">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7917">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7917">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7918">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7918">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7919">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7919">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7920">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7920">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7921">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7921">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7922">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7923">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7924">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7925">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7926">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7926">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7927">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7927">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7928">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7928">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7929">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7929">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7930">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7930">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7931">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7931">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7932">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7932">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-7933">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-7933">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8023">Driver's Licenses#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8023">Driver's Licenses#</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8031">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8031">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8032">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8032">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8033">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8033">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8034">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8034">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8035">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8035">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8036">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8036">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8037">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8037">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8038">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8038">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8039">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8039">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8040">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8040">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8041">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8041">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8042">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8042">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8043">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8043">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8044">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8044">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8045">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8045">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8046">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8046">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8047">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8047">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8048">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8049">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8049">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8050">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8051">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8051">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8052">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8052">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8053">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8053">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8054">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8054">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8055">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8055">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8056">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8056">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8057">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8057">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8058">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8058">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8059">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8059">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8060">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8060">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8061">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8061">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8062">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8062">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8063">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8063">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8084"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8084">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8086">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8086">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8087">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8087">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8088">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8089">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8089">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8090">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8090">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8091">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8091">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8092">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8092">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8093">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8093">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8094">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8095">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8095">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8096">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8098">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8098">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8099">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8099">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8100">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8101">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8101">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8102">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8102">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8103">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8103">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8104">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8104">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8105">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8105">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8106">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8106">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8107">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8107">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8108">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8108">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8109">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8109">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8110">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8110">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8111">SSA 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8111">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8112">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8112">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8113">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8113">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8114">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8114">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8115">社会保障号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8115">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8116">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8116">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8117">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8117">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8118">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8118">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8119">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8119">SSNS</span></span>
