## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8123">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8123">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8124">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8124">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8125">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8125">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8126">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8126">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8128">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8128">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8129">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8130">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8130">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8131">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8132">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8132">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8133">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8134">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8135">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8135">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8136">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8136">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8157">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8157">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8158">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8159">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8159">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8160">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8160">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8161">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8161">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8162">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8163">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8163">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8164">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8165">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8166">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8166">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8167">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8167">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8176">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8176">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8178">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8178">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8180">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8180">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8181">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8181">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8182">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8182">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8183">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8184">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8184">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8185">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8186">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8187">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8187">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8188">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8188">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8190">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8190">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8191">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8191">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8192">护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8192">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8193">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8193">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8194">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8194">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce82c-8195">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce82c-8195">номер паспорта</span></span>
